CartDeliveryGroupMethodAdj.name: CartDeliveryGroupMethodAdj
CartDeliveryGroupMethodAdj.description: Represents the shipping promotion discount for a shipping method.

AdjustmentAmount.description: Amount subtracted from the price by the shipping promotion discount.

AdjustmentBasisReferenceId.description: ID of the adjustment basis reference. This is the coupon that causes the adjustment. This field is a relationship field.

AdjustmentValue.description: Number representing the value of the price adjustment. For example, if the AdjustmentType is AdjustmentPercentage, a -10 AdjustmentValue means 10 percent off. If the AdjustmentType is AdjustmentAmount, a -10 AdjustmentValue means 10 dollars off.

CartDeliveryGroupMethodId.description: ID of the cart delivery group method.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Currency ISO code of the cart.

Name.description: Name of the cart delivery group method adjustment.

PriceAdjustmentCauseId.description: ID of the price adjustment cause.

Priority.description: If there are multiple promotional adjustments, the order in which the shipping promotion is applied.

CartDeliveryGroupMethodAdj.accessRules: The CartDeliveryGroupMethodAdj object is available only if the B2B Commerce or D2C Commerce license is enabled.
